alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 10:33AM CDT until April 30 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. .Significant rainfall has caused river rises along the Goose River. Further rises to the forecast are possible over the next 24 hours, especially as rain continues this afternoon. Stay tuned for further updates. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Goose River at Hillsboro. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, MAJOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 15.5 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
